title: Counsellor Manners, his last legacy to his son enriched and embellished with grave adviso's, pat histories, and ingenious proverbs, apologues, and apophthegms / by Josiah Dare.
author: Dare, Josiah, 17th cent.
publisher: Printed for Edward Gough and are to be sold by most booksellers in London,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Bristol Public Library.
